Edit
Synopsis
Bundled with the limited edition volume 14 and volume 16.

The first episode will cover the chapter 48-49 where it centers on Yuiga and Asumi faking a date on the beach, and later Yuiga meets his teacher Mafuyu Kirisu hiding since she accidentally lost her bikini top.

The second episode will feature all five main female leads in a wedding ceremony.

(Source: ANN)
